mapper.insert: insert into t_sjlianjie (sjlianjieId, sjlianjieName, sjlianjieMark, sjlianjieMark1, sjlianjieMark2, sjlianjiePhone, sjlianjieDizhi, sjlianjieDate, sjlianjieDate1, sjlianjieType, sjlianjieType1, sjlianjieDouble, sjlianjieDouble1) values (#{sjlianjieId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sjlianjieName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sjlianjieMark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sjlianjieMark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sjlianjieMark2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sjlianjiePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sjlianjieDizhi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sjlianjieDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sjlianjieDate1,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sjlianjieType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sjlianjieType1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sjlianjieDouble,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{sjlianjieDouble1,jdbcType=DOUBLE})
mapper.update: update t_sjlianjie set sjlianjieName = #{sjlianjieName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sjlianjieMark = #{sjlianjieMark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sjlianjieMark1 = #{sjlianjieMark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sjlianjieMark2 = #{sjlianjieMark2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sjlianjiePhone = #{sjlianjiePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sjlianjieDizhi = #{sjlianjieDizhi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sjlianjieDate = #{sjlianjieDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, sjlianjieDate1 = #{sjlianjieDate1,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, sjlianjieType = #{sjlianjieType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sjlianjieType1 = #{sjlianjieType1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sjlianjieDouble = #{sjlianjieDouble,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, sjlianjieDouble1 = #{sjlianjieDouble1,jdbcType=DOUBLE} where sjlianjieId = #{sjlianjieId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select sjlianjieId, sjlianjieName, sjlianjieMark, sjlianjieMark1, sjlianjieMark2, sjlianjiePhone, sjlianjieDizhi, sjlianjieDate, sjlianjieDate1, sjlianjieType, sjlianjieType1, sjlianjieDouble, sjlianjieDouble1 from t_sjlianjie where sjlianjieId = #{sjlianjieId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
